name: Love-All
description:
"Look if you had one shot or one opportunity to seize everything you ever wanted in one moment would you capture it or just let it slip?" - Eminem

Plot Summary

Of course, this particular shot is a series of tennis shots across the court as you take control of Nate Perry, a senior at Pine Classical and a member of the varsity tennis team. He's had a crush on Eva Date, the captain of the women's team and long-term childhood friend of Nate's. They meet up at the end of the bracket for Pine Classical's Battle of the Sexes intramural tennis tournament. Nate has made up his made and decides that after this match he is going to put his feelings for Eva on the line. Will he be able to find the courage, will Eva take the match and assert herself at the top of the Pine Classical tennis hierarchy once again. Find out this and more in Love-All!

Featuring

  • Three Unique Endings
  • Two Amazing Tennis Player
  • One hopefully fun mini-game
  • And a match you won't want to miss

Created By

Edictiop (Lead Game Designer and wearer of many hats)

boolkeans(Lead Artist)

Completed for O2A2

Word Court

968 according to Google Docs
